Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo

The definition of business objects used inside the framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Business.Cacheable<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Business.InputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends Throwable> Is able to read an input stream corresponding to a locally cached business object, from a URI, and indicate its last update time stamp.
Business.IOStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends Throwable>  
Business.NullableUriInputStreamer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends Exception,NullExceptionType extends Exception> Is supposed to retrieve the input stream and its underlying object time stamp remotely.
Business.OutputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends Throwable> Is able to write the input stream corresponding to a local business object, attached to a URI.
Business.Urier<UriType,ParameterType> Enables to define the way to reach a business object entity depending on its source.
Business.UriInputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends Exception> Is supposed to retrieve the input stream and its underlying object time stamp remotely.
Business.UriStreamParser<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends Exception> An interface which proposes in addition to its parent to split each web service call into three separate actions: compute the URI, get the corresponding input stream, and then parse the result.
Business.UriStreamParserSerializer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends Exception>  
Business.UriStreamSerializer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends Exception> An interface which proposes to serialize a business object as an input stream.
 

Class Summary
Business Gathers various interfaces which handle business objects.
Business.Atom Associates a time stamp to an object.
Business.Cached<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends Throwable,InputExceptionType extends Exception>  
Business.InputAtom Associates a time stamp to an input stream.
Business.ObjectCached<BusinessObjectType extends Serializable,ParameterType,NullExceptionType extends Exception>  
Business.ObjectUriStreamSerializer<BusinessObjectType extends Serializable,UriType,ParameterType> Serializes and parses the underlying business object via the native Java mechanism.
Business.OutputAtom Associates a time stamp to an output stream.
 

Enum Summary
Business.Source Indicates the origin of a business object.
 

Exception Summary
Business.BusinessException  
Business.NoUriInputStreamerException Indicates that no exception can be triggered by the Business.InputStreamer interface.
 

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo Description

The definition of business objects used inside the framework.
